description.short:
dumb proof of concept and kinda bugged but

- press F to switch between modes
- first time u click left mouse it will either lock or unlock ur camera depending on the mode

needs work but thats what i was talking about. the only thing app commands would add here is instead of pressing a button we would type in a command AND it could be limited to admins so all players would be locked into 'gamer mode' <@1099579050378399806>
description.raw_message_content:
dumb proof of concept and kinda bugged but

- press F to switch between modes
- first time u click left mouse it will either lock or unlock ur camera depending on the mode

needs work but thats what i was talking about. the only thing app commands would add here is instead of pressing a button we would type in a command AND it could be limited to admins so all players would be locked into 'gamer mode' <@1099579050378399806>

ai.description: Proof-of-concept that toggles between camera modes when the player presses F, and locks or unlocks the camera on left mouse click depending on the active mode. Designed as a prototype for an over-the-shoulder gamer camera style with potential admin-only command support.
